subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Stanley, who played 21 seasons and was noted for a lumbering skating style, won four Stanley Cups with Toronto in the 1960s, including the team’s last championship, in 1967.
snippet: Stanley, who played 21 seasons and was noted for a lumbering skating style, won four Stanley Cups with Toronto in the 1960s, including the team’s last championship, in 1967.
